Head Priest of the Earth Gerald:

If you have Soulshot Ticket, you can exchange it for Soulshots or Spiritshots through the Game Assistant. To do so, open the Items menu and look there for Soulshots/ Spiritshots.

Oh!.. I've heard some new. You know, it is rumoured...

Bathis, the Guard Captain of Gludio, has been recently looking for adventurers who can bring him Tarantula's Venom Sac.

I'm sure you are able to do that job. What to you think?
